title: Exciting platform
comment: This is an empowering way to participate in the news. The app allows for gathering evidence at the scene of the story that is immediately uploaded to preserve its integrity. I'm excited to see how this grows as more people start reporting.

title: Garbled video, needs more features
comment: Garbled video on my Bionic. Also needs: 1. Front camera support for Gingerbread and higher (useful for traffic stops if your phone is in a windshield mount) 2. Great idea though.

title: Works great!
comment: Works great on my LG Optimus V.  Just did a test audio recording, a test video, and a test upload to the openwatch server. All seems to work smooth as silk.  My only suggestion as others have mentioned is to not have the home key end the recording. It's too frequently used and probably the first thing a cop will tap if he/she grabs your phone.
